query: make the color theme in figma orange

messages.content: make the color theme in figma orange

Got it—happy to switch the theme to orange. A couple quick details so I apply it correctly:

- Scope: whole file, current page, or just your current selection?
- Orange to use: do you have a brand hex? If not, I can use a default like #F97316 (Orange 600).

Optional defaults I can use:
- Primary: #F97316
- Dark accent: #C2410C
- Light background: #FFEDD5
- On-orange text: #FFFFFF

Tell me the scope and base orange (or say “use defaults”), and I’ll apply it. If you prefer, select the top-level frame(s) you want updated and say “apply to selection.”
